Then Randy and Cody attempt to setup a new farm they are calling “The River Farm” they attempt to plant a food plot, bush hog, spray the plot, setup a new Titan blind, and setup a Hooyman dual perimeter fence all in one day before the sun goes down.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Back at the Raven for bow camp and everything is coming together. Randy has a close encounter with one of the OG bucks on the property while Nate closes the deal on a big five year old.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian is Joined by Ryan Harder from Zman on an epic 70-mile inshore fishing journey in the Lowcountry, aiming for the coveted inshore slam.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian heads to Tuskegee, Alabama to night-fish the home waters of the one and only Mark Daniels Junior.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian hosts a championship for his SUF tournament series. Anglers from all over the country will travel to lake Sinclair to compete for the grand prize.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian discovers a hot bass bite while crappie Fishing one of his local lakes.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Join Brian Latimer on Straight Up Fishing TV as he explores Florida’s premier trophy bass fishing lakes. From uncovering hidden hotspots to sharing expert tips and techniques, Brian takes you on an exhilarating journey through the Sunshine State’s most bountiful waters.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian Latimer and Peter Przepiora of Omnia Fishing dodge Hurricane Debbie and use the Omnia App to find a bite.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Follow TTHA President/CEO Christina Pittman and her husband Matt this week as they chase Whitetails at Morrow Ranch. This is a hunt that they had purchased earlier at the Disabled Outdoorsman in the year to be able to spend some time in the woods. A few days away to relax and spend quality time with loved ones should always be a priority. Morrow Ranch is definitely a go to place for low fence Texas hunting.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: John Sewell has played a huge part in the development of feeding Fortified Cottonseed 365 days a year. Laramie Barrett of Fortified Cottonseed joins John for a great weekend of hunting at his ranch in Uvalde, Texas. This is a great time for Laramie to get away from the office and see the first hand of how their product is performing.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We love our members. We spent some time in camp with Ron Chandler. Ron Recently renewed his TTHA Membership in 2022 and was awarded a member hunt for 2023. We spend time reflecting on what hunting means to Ron and spending time in camp at G2 with hunters alike.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Cable is a huge supporter of Texas Hunting and everything Teas Trophy Hunters. We are blessed to spend a few days with hum at the beautiful Saddle Creek Ranch in Brady Texas. Greg has a tight management plan and we are glad we got to enjoy his ranch with him and his team.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Over the years we have been able to hunt with a lot of amazing people. This episode takes us to Las Palmas ranch to hunt with Payton Angelle. Payton was awarded this hunt from the amazing people over at Sky High for kids.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Follow TTHA President/CEO Christina Pittman and her husband Matt this week as they tag along side Dr. James Kroll for his annual deer day! This is a great opportunity to learn from one of the best. We are blessed to be able to share his knowledge with other like minded outdoor enthusiasts.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We love our college chapters. Hudson has been a long time member of TTHA as well as serving with the Texas A&M Chapter. We have a great time at G2 in pursuit of Axis deer.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: In 2010, Amberly Snyder’s life changed forever when an accident left her paralyzed from the waist-down. Her comeback story not unlike something you’d see in a movie…in fact it inspired one. Disabled Outdoorsmen USA contacted TTHA and set up this hunt and we were fortunate enough to be able to capture just some of Amberly’s story and her harvest of a beautiful Axis buck at the G2 Ranch in the spring of 2022.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Denise Sanchez was awarded a hunt at G2 following our Hunters Extravaganza drawings. Its great to get to spend time on the ranch with new members of TTHA. Denise gets familiar with a giant and learns about new technology while on this hunt.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: The bond between and parent and child can grow in many ways, but nothing compares to the bond shared when hunting. The annual Father-Son hunt at FE Hill Outfitters has becoming a tradition for Heath and his son Gavin and in 2021, Gavin was able to take his largest buck to date, with his dad Heath behind the camera.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We find ourselves fishing with Troy from Lonestar Beer. Not only is Troy a great friend he is also a big supporter of Hunters Extravaganza. We get to catch up in the offseason and spend a day on the water discussing future events and reflect on what all Texas has to offer.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: WE join Bobby Falkenberg as he joins Bret Ferguson from Double T Outfitters. Bobby is an avid outdoorsman, judge, and father of 5. Bret manages 30,000 acres in Ozona TX, the knowledge he has of every inch of this amazing low fence ranch is remarkable. Bobby has an action packed 2 day hunt.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: The hunt for the Hayblower buck is finally over. A cold front in Georgia had the deer on their feet and Tyler Jordan was able to take full advantage with his bow on Realtree Farms.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Realtree's crew of waterfowl hunters get together for their annual Louisiana duck hunt. Dr. Duck, Billy Campbell, Rusty Creasey, and Michael Pitts head down south to get on the ducks. There's a lot of ducks around, but they're playing hard to get. So, the guys have to get creative to make it happen.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: With record low temperatures in the forecast, the Black Cloud crew hits the timber for one last hunt before the freeze. Some days hunting ducks in the Timber is all about your calling and decoy spread... some days you're on the X and none of that matters.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: The Road Trips crew gets one more hunt in before the rain arrives in Georgia. Michael Pitts finally has the right wind to head back into the honey hole. Colton Jordan hunts with his father Bill hoping to lay eyes on a buck they spotted earlier in the year. Tyler Jordan decides to hang and hunt a new spot where a big 9-pointer is showing up.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan and the Under Taker are hunting cranes down South. Check in to see how the hunt went. It was certainly a waterfowl hunt to remember.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Public competition, little sleep, mother nature, and a wrong turn. It's a rough weekend for the Arkansas opener but Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell wouldn't be anywhere else. It's the Super Bowl of Duck Hunting and everyone is ready to hit the timber.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: The Realtree team meets up with Ole Miss friends Keith Carter and Ken Crain, as well as Mr. Doug from Pivotal Partners, for a Merriam's and Rio turkey hunt in northern Nebraska. The action is fast and furious. Day No. 1 brought three gobblers for team Carter/Crain. On day No. 2, the action stayed consistent and team Carter/Crain killed two more. Then, Brian Doughman from Realtree knocked down No. 6. It was another incredible hunt in the Keya Paha river valley.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell head north to the Dakotas to get a jump on the 2019 duck season with Ed McDonough and friends. Stale weather and too much water make field hunting a bust, but a cold front and a pothole covered in birds quickly changes the tempo and helps the crew ring in the new season in style.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.desc: It's Rifle Season in Oklahoma. Kyle Barefield and wife, Stevie Barefield are hunting the rut for big western bucks with the brand new X-Bolt 2 Rifle from Browning. A front blows in, and with the change in weather, 2 big whitetails go down.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Duck hunting in Louisiana is as much about its history as it is about its future. In the season's final days, Jean-Paul learns about Louisiana’s rich waterfowling history, dives into conservation projects throughout the state, and returns to Bayou Black for one last ride. Shoot straight and come hungry because it's the last hunt of the season.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The Duck Camp Dinners crew is back in the bayous as Jean-Paul wraps up his last hung of the season before his son is born. Jean-Paul shares a duck recipe handed down by his father, they forage for wild mushrooms, get into swarms of blue wing teal and celebrate the season with fire.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: After a late night of good times, venison chili, and some old school roux the crew heads out for another day of hunting ducks. Adaptability is critical, and after a couple of quick adjustments the team finds themselves back in the ducks.

programme.title: Be Real
programme.desc: Rusty Creasey knows a thing or two about duck hunting. He manages the legendary Coca-Cola Woods property in McCrory, Arkansas, has his own line of Echo Duck calls and has placed in the World’s Championship Duck Calling Contest time and again. Further, his skills and expertise have been showcased on many duck hunting shows and podcasts. Yet despite his success as a professional duck hunter, Creasey says managing the Coca-Cola Woods is what he loves most. Known for offering some of the best green timber duck hunting in the Mid-South, the Coca-Cola property was originally bought by the family who owned the Coca-Cola bottling company and turned into a duck club in 1937. Creasey stresses the importance of thanking folks who’ve had a positive impact in your life. “Whoever took you and got you started in the outdoors, if they are still around, thank them,” he says. “Thank them while you still can. My uncle got sick with cancer. I told my mama I want to thank him for everything he did. Little league games. Fishing. And I had that opportunity. I wrote him a birthday card and told him how much he meant to me. He told me that was the best birthday present he ever got. A month later, he lost his battle with cancer, but I had that closure and was able to thank him.” He says since 2002, he’s made a point to thank everyone who has meant anything to him. “My daddy,” he says. “Lost him in 2018. Last thing I told him was I loved him. Thanked him. He was my hero. If I leave you with anything, do this for me. Thank whoever it is. Be it your mama, your daddy, your uncle or your grandpa. Hug their neck, and thank them for all they’ve done for you. Without them planting that seed in us, we wouldn’t be who we are today.”

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: Anyone can be a cowboy—that’s the biggest thing the DIRT crew learned in Texas. From riding bulls in Fort Worth to off-roading in the Chihuahuan desert to forging their own path across this vast state with the help of local trailblazers Liz and Lou Lambert. Lucky for us, they even stopped by Huckberry’s own backyard in Austin for a quick ruck and a couple games of chicken sh*t bingo. When the dust finally settled, we fired up the barbecue for our beefiest feast yet and raised our ranch waters high to 10 DIRT episodes in the can.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his family’s traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, he’ll meet plenty of farmers and foragers—harvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament
programme.desc: Day 2 of the BaitFuel Fishing Tour Championship out of Gananoque, Ontario on the St. Lawrence River

programme.title: Sportsman's Journal
programme.desc: Tyler and Sara take the show on the road for the first ice outing of the year. They head to Lake of the Woods at Tamarack Island Wilderness Lodge!

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike heads to Crystal river to chase Redfish in his new Cayo Skiff.

programme.title: FinQuest Outdoors
programme.desc: In the premiere of FinQuest, freshwater pro Ryan Miller dives into the world of saltwater fishing in Florida. Guided by Alex Burgess, Ryan tackles sailfish and tuna while mastering kite fishing. The adventure continues with his family as they enjoy a thrilling hydrofoil ride in Jupiter, Florida, blending fishing excitement with family fun on the water.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: It's May of 2022 and Mark Peterson is waterfowl hunting in Argentina. A year has passed since Mark conquered the North America Waterfowl Slam. During the off-season, and with Covid just a memory, his focus shifted to thoughts of South America and the waterfowl species that it holds. After a few months of research and talking with the experts at Worldwide Trophy Adventures, he laid out the plan to attempt the South America slam in 2022. With 20 species on the list, Mark is now hunting ducks below the equator as they migrate North to warmer weather. Enjoy this first installment of a 9 episode series that showcases his new quest for another single-season waterfowl slam.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson closes out the half way point on the South America Waterfowl Slam. On just the third day of the hunt, he is able to take a Chilean Wigeon and a Rosy Billed Pochard which make species number 9 and 10 of the 20 on his list. Mark is still sharing the blind with Matt Gindorff, a WTA consultant, and they discuss waterfowl hunting in Argentina and how it compares to that of the U.S.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is duck hunting for the 4th day in Argentina and finds that luck is on his side. He and Matt head to a blind for an early morning hunt in hopes of getting a Black Headed Duck before they disappear for the day in the reeds. He also still needs a Red Shoveler, but things take a quick turn while he is walking through the marsh, about to call it a day. Enjoy this episode of The Journey Within

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson continues his quest on the Hearst Ranch in California. Next up on the list, California Aoudad. These Aoudad were introduced to the ranch in the early 1920s and have thrived ever since.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark finally closes in on the Brazilian Teal in Argentina. This is the last of the 13 species that he had planned to target while hunting in Argentina for the South America Waterfowl Slam, but it didn't come easy. To find this last one, he and the crew must travel farther North to warmer weather and ultimately find themselves wrapping up this leg of the journey.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: It took a couple days longer than expected, but Mark Peterson finally gets species number 14, the Knob-Billed duck while hunting in Peru. After a couple of close calls, this one was the definition of adapt and overcome. Mark and the crew had to first find the birds, then learn what it was going to take to get into the right position in order to capitalize. Of course, there was some fast mid-day action along the way to keep spirits high.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: This week Mark continues his hunt in Australia on Marble Island. After a successful first day, the group heads out the next morning in search of a Sambar stag. After closing the distance Mark isn’t able to get a steady rest so they move in closer while the Sambar stag is on the move.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson finishes the South America Waterfowl Slam in the Andes at 15,000 feet elevation. With only 2 days left, he is able to capitalize on every opportunity and take the remaining 6 species needed on the list of 20. It's been an incredible journey, and it all comes down to this!

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: Team Primos is in Western Kansas this week at Heartland Pride Outfitters, and are absolutely covered up with longbeards!

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: Brad & crew hop north of the border into Nebraska and finish up a fantastic Midwest turkey trip!

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: Lake & Jordan head north to Minnesota and Wisconsin to chase longbeards with good friends Joel Nelson and Dave Owens.

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: It’s non-stop and up-close big bull action as Team Primos kicks off the 2020 season with an early September hunt in New Mexico. The entire team is in camp and on-point to chase some big bugling bulls. Brad Farris drew the long straw this fall and waste no time heading up the mountain with Will Primos dropping back and firing up the Hyper lip double, Hoochie mama and the bullet bugle elk calls.

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: Jordan “Big Country” Blissett gets in the driver’s seat for some up-close action—and we do mean UP CLOSE! Brad needs plenty of help packing his bull off the mountain, and Lake is down to a precious few days to hunt before heading off for Arizona.

programme.title: Primos
programme.desc: It’s T-Roy’s turn to get on the board in New Mexico, but Team Primos runs into an all-day affair with a stubborn bull in his own bedroom. How long will this old boy test Troy’s patience as he waits behind his Mathews bow with Will, Jordan and Slade standing by.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade takes you on a ride through one of the coolest cities in the south, the historic Natchez, Mississippi. This is an area in which Slade sells a lot of hunting land and being only 40 minutes from where he grew up, Slade is very familiar with all there is to do in the area not only from a recreational standpoint but also for entertainment. Slade takes you through the showing process on a beautiful piece of property and bring it full circle at the closing. You’ll also watch a deer hunt with Slade in Natchez that was featured on Realtree Monster Bucks DVD. This is a jampacked episode with so much to learn and also enjoy. We know you’ll love it.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade gives you the grand tour of his home property. Slade’s dream was the same as many others, have a place where he can build a home, raise a family, and also have plenty of room to enjoy the outdoors and chase big rack bucks. Slade gives you a breakdown of how he took his raw tract of land and turned it into a beautiful homestead and outdoor paradise. If you are interested in how you can achieve your dream of raising a family on a dream property, this is the episode for you.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade takes us through his new investment property, and breaks downwhat’s involved in taking a raw land tract and creating extremely desirable turn-keyhunting properties.Caleb and Slade double up on some Wilkinson County gobblers for Calebs first turkeykill ever.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade and part of the old Trained Assassins Crew, Luke Mitchell (producer) and Ryan Wascom (host), head out to Colorado to chase bugling elk with their bows. Also joining the crew is one of Slade’s real estate clients and his son. Part of the deal when this client worked with Slade was that Slade lined them up an elk hunt the following fall. It is an amazing week at camp with five arrows being sent down range and multiple elk hitting the dirt. You do not want to miss this one.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, we are super busy juggling the turkey season opener, but we also have our real estate convention in Gulf Shores Alabama, multiple listing videos to complete, and property showings. It happens every year to us, spring kicks off and people want to have properties of their own knowing dog gone well it’s the most wonderful time of the year. TURKEY SEASON! It’s a jam up of a week. You’re not going to want to miss it.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, we are smacking turkeys and making mid-term investments. 1031 Tax money is the number one way to build your land portfolio and create a place for your family to enjoy. Follow along as we turn a old beat up piece of dirt and turn it into the ultimate place ground for a hunter such as myself. From habitat to harvest we have been on fire.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: Watch as Lori tags her first turkey of the season as well as the daily grind and comments from the office in McComb, Mississippi. The ladies in the office isn’t too fond of turkey season until it’s their turn.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade and the new producer (Tim Guidroz) go out on their first turkey hunt together, and even though the weather is not ideal, they get the job done on a Wilkinson County gobbler. We also get a look at what the United Country - Southern States Realty office looks like during turkey season, with interviews from Scott Lindsey and Caleb Armstrong, and three big properties closing in Baton Rouge.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Mike heads to Table Rock Lake to meet up with Trenton and his family. Even battling the tough fishing conditions following a heavy front, there’s never a lack of family time, laughs or friendly competitions with the Southards.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton is headed to meet up with Andrew Norbye on Lake Guntersville in Alabama. With not a lot of current being pulled, the deep schools weren’t set up to feed. So they went up shallow to fish grass until evening time when the ledge fish really started biting.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Rex meets up with “Mr Crappie” Wally Marshall in Texas. Wally takes Rex to one of his secret spots to put the hammer on the crappie. Not only did they catch crappie, but nice largemouth and some top tier coppernose bluegill.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew heads to Rivers Lodge and Hunt Club in Kansas to fish strip pits. Trenton and Rex take on Mike and Nate in a 3 period mini tournament. With multiple species allowed including northern pike, the two teams are neck and neck after the first two periods. Due to bad weather on day 2, period 3 turned into a hour speed round where only keeper largemouth count.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton meets up with Tom Brewbaker as they fly down to Venice Louisiana to fish with Mike Frenette. Mike runs the Redfish Lodge of Louisiana and has over forty years of angling experience. Mike teaches the guys about the local waters including pogey boats and most importantly, world class red fish.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton goes down North Carolina to learn the family secrets of the Forehand family. Ben Forehand is a guitarist for Christian Contemporary artist Pat Barret. When Ben isn’t playing guitar, he runs Wild and Free Outfitters getting people into the outdoors hunting and fishing, getting their minds off of the everyday grind. . Even though fishing is tough the guys build strong friendships and lasting memories.

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: A disgraced record exec forms a bond with a young singer-songwriter changing each of their lives.

programme.title: A Hologram for the King
programme.desc: Desperate for new business, an American businessman packs up his product and travels to Saudi Arabia in a last ditch effort to generate revenue.

programme.title: Dimension 404
programme.desc: An Army psychologist races against the clock to treat BOB, a depressed NSA supercomputer made of human flesh.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, 16-year-old Katniss volunteers to take her younger sister’s place in a battle where children must fight to stay alive.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: As Katniss and Peeta embark on their victory tour, President Snow plans an even deadlier new Hunger Games, which threatens the future of Panem.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss is rescued by rebels and brought to District 13 where she becomes The Mockingjay.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, 16-year-old Katniss volunteers to take her younger sister’s place in a battle where children must fight to stay alive.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: As Katniss and Peeta embark on their victory tour, President Snow plans an even deadlier new Hunger Games, which threatens the future of Panem.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss is rescued by rebels and brought to District 13 where she becomes The Mockingjay.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

programme.title: All Is Lost
programme.desc: A sailor on a solo voyage collides with a shipping container. With his boat leaking and equipment ruined, he must face a violent storm alone.

programme.title: Skiptrace
programme.desc: A tough investigator from Hong Kong and an American gambling man pair up to bring down the infamous head of a Chinese narcotics syndicate.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom
programme.desc: Stephen and his brother Bloom work one last job; conning a beautiful young heiress out of her cash.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four cunning magicians are trailed by a federal agent and an Interpol detective, who attempt to figure out how they rob corrupt leaders.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: The Four Horsemen return for a second mind-bending adventure, elevating the limits of illusion to new heights with their most impossible heist yet.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A perfectly planned jewel heist goes awry, leaving the team of criminals to question each other and sniff out the rat who gave them away.

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Female flight attendant Jackie Brown becomes a key figure in a plot between the federal authorities and her street-tough arms dealer boss.

programme.title: True Stories
programme.desc: David Byrne whimsically pays homage to the mythical small Texas town of Virgil.

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: Six young urbanites with budding careers and restless hearts share their dreams, their music, and the common courtyard between their apartments.

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Neurotic conman Roy and his protégé Frank find their latest scam disrupted when Roy discovers he has a teen daughter who wants to meet him.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: During World War II, a young Scottish woman travels to London, then gets involved with the French Resistance while trying to rescue her missing lover.

programme.title: Chaos Theory
programme.desc: An obsessively organized man learns that he’s sterile … and that his daughter was fathered by his best friend.

programme.title: Beyond The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: Two rival salvage teams race through a capsized luxury liner to claim a secret fortune aboard the ship.

programme.title: Corrina, Corrina
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg and Ray Liotta star in the story of a maid in 1959 whose care for a widower and his daughter leads to racial backlash of their love.

programme.title: Critters
programme.desc: After escaping from a maximum-security prison asteroid, a band of extraterrestrial flesh-eating criminals unwittingly land on planet Earth.

programme.title: Critters 2: The Main Course
programme.desc: When two men find a bunch of exotic eggs, the critters soon hatch and unleash a hungry horde of ugly little monsters on their small Kansas town.

programme.title: Critters 3
programme.desc: Let round three begin in the battle for the planet! The flesh-eating alien fuzzballs return to try a whole new fare: city dwellers.

programme.title: Critters 4
programme.desc: This futuristic tale finds spacecraft crew members dealing with an infestation of furry, flesh-eating creatures let loose aboard their ship.

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons
programme.desc: When the evil returns years later to avenge what transpired in Izmer, five adventurers and thieves must thwart the traps, ghouls and armies of hell.

programme.title: Curly Sue
programme.desc: Conning people on the streets to survive, an orphan and her down-and-out guardian try to pull a scam on a jaded attorney ready to open her heart.

programme.title: Dancer in the Dark
programme.desc: Björk stars in this powerful drama about a woman desperately trying to save her son's sight.

programme.title: Deep Cover
programme.desc: A maverick Cleveland cop with a turbulent past gets hand-picked by the DEA to infiltrate an international cocaine cartel in Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Little Drummer Girl
programme.desc: Academy Award-winner Diane Keaton stars in a tale of espionage based on John Le Carré's best-selling novel.

programme.title: In the Mood
programme.desc: In 1944, Sonny (Patrick Dempsey) has an affair with his adult neighbor, and the two run away to get married.

programme.title: The Main Event
programme.desc: Barbara Streisand stars in a romantic comedy about the owner of a perfume company and an over-the-hill boxer.

programme.title: The Mummy Lives
programme.desc: An ancient mummy returns from the dead and becomes obsessed with a woman he believes is his dead lover.

programme.title: One on One
programme.desc: A small town basketball star wins an athletic scholarship, but soon learns his challenges have only begun.

programme.title: Stroker Ace
programme.desc: A winning NASCAR driver is forced to accept an onerous contract from a fried chicken magnate.

programme.title: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
programme.desc: In the year 2087, a bold casino owner, his android bodyguard and a beautiful, aspiring singer are on the run from a millionaire gangster on the moon.

programme.title: Black Beauty
programme.desc: The classic story of a courageous horse who faced enemies and natural disasters, all while seeing the best and worst of humanity.

programme.title: Hamlet (1996)
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh leads an all-star cast in an adaptation of Shakespeare's great tragedy - the story of Hamlet.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenage girl struggles to balance the trials of high school, the discipline of martial arts, and the thrill of her first romance.

programme.title: 3 Ninjas Kick Back
programme.desc: After following their grandfather to Japan, the three young ninjas-in-training find themselves running from brain-dead thieves and an army of ninjas.

programme.title: Zoom
programme.desc: A former superhero who has lost his powers is forced back into action to help turn a motley crew of kids into the next great world-savers.

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Warm holiday tale about a single mom wishing for a loving man for Christmas. Soon, her daughter tells a mall Santa who tries to grant her Mom’s wish.

programme.title: Troop Beverly Hills
programme.desc: A wealthy socialite takes charge of her daughter’s wilderness troop and teaches the girls a series of unconventional survival skills.

programme.title: 3 Ninjas Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Rocky, Colt and Tum Tum take on a ruthless businessman whose waste management company has been illegally dumping toxic waste at an Indian reservation.

programme.title: 3 Ninjas: High Noon at Mega Mountain
programme.desc: Join the Ninja brothers for a rollercoaster ride of fun and action, as they witness the kidnapping of a TV superstar and strike back with a vengeance.

programme.title: Taking 5
programme.desc: Two nerdy teens fan-out to the extreme and plot to kidnap the world’s most famous boy band to make them play at their school and make them popular.

programme.title: North
programme.desc: After a judge allows him to sever ties to his work-obsessed parents, a boy embarks on an international quest for the quintessential set of parents.

programme.title: Bingo
programme.desc: A circus dog named Bingo becomes involved in a variety of adventures and misdemeanors, but that doesn't stop him from eventually making his way home!

programme.title: Baby Geniuses
programme.desc: When a scheming billionaire decides to steal the pre-language baby code to take over the world, the little tykes team up and fight back.

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: When a lovable mechanical marvel of a robot is accidentally electrocuted, he flees his lab and lands on a young girl’s doorstep, ready for adventure

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: After Amy (Anna Paquin) loses her mother in a car accident, she must uproot her life and move to Canada to live with her father, Thomas, (Jeff Daniels), an oddball inventor with whom she has no relationship. She initially struggles to find her her place in her new home, but things change when she stumbles upon a collection of abandoned goose eggs. When the eggs hatch, Amy and her dad work together teaching the motherless birds to fly south for the winter, and their relationship blooms.

programme.title: Madeline
programme.desc: Ludwig Bemelmans’ beloved story comes to life as the famously precocious and bright Parisian youngster must save her school from being sold.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: This reimagining of the classic German fairy tale tells of a wicked sorcerer who curses a princess to live as a swan, until she finds true love.

programme.title: Rudyard Kipling's The Second Jungle Book: Mowgli and Baloo
programme.desc: Based on a story by Rudyard Kipling.

programme.title: Annie: A Royal Adventure
programme.desc: Annie and her pals go to London with Daddy Warbucks, where they must stop an evil noblewoman's plot to blow up Buckingham Palace.

programme.title: Slappy and the Stinkers
programme.desc: On a class trip to the aquarium, school kids rebel against their mean principal by stealing a sea lion that seems unhappy and trying to set it free.

programme.title: The Trumpet of the Swan
programme.desc: A mute little trumpeter swan worries about finding his way in the world, until a gift helps him find his voice and embark on a high-flying adventure.

programme.title: Soccer Dog: European Cup
programme.desc: A soccer-playing dog escapes from the evil scientists who designed him. He bands together with a father and son to inspire a downtrodden town.

programme.title: Troop Beverly Hills
programme.desc: A wealthy socialite takes charge of her daughter’s wilderness troop and teaches the girls a series of unconventional survival skills.

programme.title: Little Secrets
programme.desc: A pre-teen violin virtuoso tries to fund her dreams by setting up a booth in her backyard where she hears and keeps young people’s deepest secrets.

programme.title: Emma's Chance
programme.desc: While doing community service at a horse rescue ranch, a girl forms an unlikely bond with an abused stallion that will not let anyone else ride him.

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: After Amy (Anna Paquin) loses her mother in a car accident, she must uproot her life and move to Canada to live with her father, Thomas, (Jeff Daniels), an oddball inventor with whom she has no relationship. She initially struggles to find her her place in her new home, but things change when she stumbles upon a collection of abandoned goose eggs. When the eggs hatch, Amy and her dad work together teaching the motherless birds to fly south for the winter, and their relationship blooms.

programme.title: The Indian in the Cupboard

programme.title: A Raisin in the Sun

McCall's cold-blooded killing of Hickok was warranted. Or was it?

programme.desc: A man's corpse disguised as a scarecrow is found in a cornfield; Booth and Brennan question the victim's three wives, who are also sisters; Cam doubts her relationship.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team analyzes a BMX rider's remains, discovered on the roof of a warehouse; Sweets asks Booth for advice; Booth makes a decision about Hannah.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the liquefied remains of a wedding planner are found in a tanning bed on Valentine's Day, Cam pressures the team to work fast so she can spend the holiday with her boyfriend; Clark helps Hodgins realize the best gifts come from the heart.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: The murder of a British spy may be linked to an adulterous dating site.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Michelle team up with a con artist to catch a human trafficker.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: An actor is murdered while filming an alleged cursed horror movie.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: The police superintendent interferes with the capture of a murder suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and Speedle investigate the manufacture of lethal drugs at mobile labs; an elderly woman is murdered at a senior citizen home.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A serial rapist is found dead of suffocation; investigators probe the murders of a crematorium owner and a girl found behind the crematorium.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Team members meet an environmental lawyer who has radiation poisoning after they are exposed to radiation during an investigation.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man stands trial for a murder he didn't commit, while Horatio and the team race to find the real killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Routine disposal of drug evidence goes horribly wrong, leaving two police officers dead and the CSI team under investigation.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio wants to question a murder victim's boyfriend, but the FBI won't divulge his location; Calleigh's father pays a visit.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An ex-con asks Horatio to help him find his missing son; Speedle investigates a man's death by asphyxia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Marks on a female corpse on a beach lead Horatio to think the perpetrator is a serial killer who bites victims; Calleigh and Delko investigate a murder at a motel pool.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When prostitutes are murdered in Texas, their deaths seem to have religious overtones; members of the team are put at risk throughout the course of the investigation.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The investigation in Texas reveals a deep web of corruption; Garcia must save a friend.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates a series of murders with unidentifiable victims in Bakersfield, Calif.; agent Kate Callahan joins the team.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team members search for a vengeful suspect who was once abused; Garcia travels to Texas to confront the person she shot.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team goes to Colorado to investigate when a passenger jet crashes; the incident reminds Kate of a family tragedy.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Long-suppressed family secrets, stolen ancient artefacts, and a thirty year old death at a Celtic burial site result in a series of murders in present day Midsomer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Midsomer hosts its 12th Annual Literary Festival, an author is found with his neck broken. More writers will die before the winner of the competition is announced.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Tom Barnaby and DS Dan Scott investigate the shotgun murder of Jamie Cruikshank, a barman at the Maid in Splendour, a pub in the village of Midsomer Worthy.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the curate of the local church in Midsomer Parva is burned alive in the effigy of the straw woman, DCI Tom Barnaby and DS Dan Scott find themselves investigating what must be a murder.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Exactly nine years after Ferdy Villers killed himself, his entire family reunites for Christmas unaware that someone is out for revenge.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The unveiling of a newly-discovered novel by deceased Midsomer crime-writer George Summersbee at the Luxton Deeping Crime Festival is jeopardised when the manuscript is stolen and a woman is fatally electrocuted by a booby-trapped roulette wheel. Can new dad Barnaby untangle a web of jealousy and obsession to find the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Could a ballad made famous by late, lamented folk singer Johnny Carver be an inspiration for murder? Did someone want to kill Toby Winning for threatening to take the Little Crosby Folk Festival away from Midsomer - or is the true motive something hidden for 20 years?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The fizz goes out of a sparkling wine launch when the glasses are laced with slug poison. Who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery and what does the attack have to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As the Barnabys prepare for Cully's wedding, Lord Fitzroy and Beth Porteous are married in the pretty village of Bledlow. At the lavish reception at Bledlow Hall that follows, however, tragedy strikes - maid of honour Marina Fellowes is found murdered in one of the rooms by some of the guests. With their honeymoon cancelled, the Fitzroys must contend with a police presence in their home, as Barnaby and Jones try to learn more about the family history. It soon becomes clear there are secrets, deception, and an illegtimate son involved in the mystery, which is further complicated when the estate manager is killed by an arrow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's a good day for the Hicks family, as the name of Tommy Hicks - who was executed during World War I for "cowardice and desertion" - is added to the list on Midsomer Parva's war memorial. Tommy's son Lionel and grandson Dave, mayor of Causton and whom Barnaby does not like (owing to dodgy building work by the mayor's company), are thrilled, but the snooty Hammonds are decidedly less pleased. Henry, the patriarch of the Hammond family, is particularly riled by his insalubrious neighbours, and has nurtured a long-running feud with the Hickses. But the evening after a battle re-enactment in the village, Henry is murdered - and Barnaby must delve into the history of the two families to find the killer, discovering a web of fraud, lies, and hidden truths.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are in Dunstan to investigate the deaths of a reclusive couple. As they try to establish whether Ron and Libby Wilson were murdered or died of natural causes, their attention is drawn to a dispute raging between a local builder and road protesters nearby. When another death occurs, the detectives learn that there are plenty of dark secrets and fierce hostilities in this apparently idyllic village. Will Jack Purdy's quick temper lead to violence? How far would the protesters go to prevent the bypass being built? And do current events somehow relate to the death of Michael Wilson many years earlier?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of Londoner Charlie Finleyson is discovered in woodland near Midsomer Sonning, Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating employees at local Midsomer Life magazine. It turns out the dead man was married to the ex-wife of Guy Sandys, the wealthy owner of the publication. As the detectives become aware of a feud between Guy and the proprietor of the Morecroft Hotel, tensions are also heating up between the locals and visiting Londoners. Soon Barnaby and Jones find themselves to trying to piece together the truth about the murder, and learn that someone might be trying to conceal something in their past.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are forced to take part in a team building exercise and Tom has plenty of problems dealing with the young, new, acting Chief Superintendent, John Cotton (Nick Fletcher). Following an explosion in a truck that had been stored in a truck depot, a body is soon discovered in a nearby lake, which turns out to be Alec Grainger, who had been seen arguing with James Parkes (Joseph Millson), the son of Colonel Matt Parkes (Tim Pigott-Smith). James appears to be involved in shady business deals and is blamed by his grandmother Caroline Halsey (Judy Parfitt) - and others - for the suicide of a woman he got pregnant two years before. Barnaby and Jones find themselves delving into a mixture of fraud, smuggling, and lies, trying to piece together the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When two couples vanish into thin air in the village of Monks Barton, Barnaby and Jones hear rumours of haunted woods and witchcraft. Barnaby remains sceptical of this, even when an unidentified body is found in a shallow grave and the missing start turning up dead. He soon has to determine if ghosts, criminals, or something else, is behind the abductions and murders.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy landowner Gregory Lancaster's body goes missing on the night of his death, a sinister web of secrets and lies is exposed in the village of Little Malton. DCI Barnaby, DS Nelson and new Forensic Pathologist Kam Karimore are drawn into a macabre world of body-snatching as they seek to identify the villain.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Mysterious lights are seen in the sky over famous UFO hot-spot Cooper Hill. When a local forest-ranger suffers a strange death the visiting UFO spotters are convinced aliens are responsible. DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson unearth suspicions, betrayals and long-buried secrets in their search for the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An international cycling competition comes to the Midsomer village of Burwood Mantle. When the race leader is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson find themselves drawn into a ruthlessly competitive world of blackmail, bribery and bloodshed where winning comes at any cost.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Art comes to the picturesque Midsomer village of Angel's Rise with the opening of a new Sculpture Park. But when its launch is marred by murder, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson have to get creative to crack a case where art imitates death, and everything has a deeper meaning.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The discovery of a Saint's bones at an archaeological dig causes a stir in the village of Midsomer Cicely. But when the leader of the dig is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson soon realise that it's not only skeletons that have been long buried in the hallowed ground.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The annual fair and the daredevil riders of the Wall of Death come to Midsomer village Whitcombe Mallet. When the owner of an equestrian centre is trampled by his horse DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson have to unravel a complex feud from the past, where nothing is what it seems...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When MATTHEW DRAPER, a quarry worker is killed by a demolition charge after obeying the orders of his foreman, IAN FRASER, to return to the unexploded device, no one can predict how it might effect the tranquil village of Fletcher's Cross nine years later...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby's aunt, Alice Bly (Phyllis Calvert), has an addiction to detective stories, a deep admiration for her favourite nephew, and is recovering from an operation at the Lawnside Nursing Home. When a resident dies, Alice Bly picks up gossip which, mixed with the detective fiction with which she is passing the hours, makes her think that all is not as it should be at Lawnside.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The village of Midsomer Mallow is one of the villages hoping to win the title of the "Perfect English Village" competition. As the story unfolds, not everything is "perfect" as local thief Peter Drinkwater is stabbed with a pitchfork at an abandoned farm, he's using as a squat. Shortly after robbing a retired actor's home. Despite the villagers' best efforts to keep the murder quiet so as to not ruin their chances in the competition, several further deaths occur eventually bringing Detective Chief Inspector Barnaby back several decades to uncover the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Whilst the Upper Marshwood hunt assemble outside the village inn, a filthy tramp-like man leaves the shop and skulks into the wood. Soon after, he hears the sound of the hunt begin and the unforgettable noise of the horses and hounds in hot pursuit of the fox. Running for cover, towards the safety of his home-made shelter, he stumbles and falls into a pit - screaming. LIZA, isolated in the disused railway carriage which constitutes her home, moves deeper into the wood having heard the scream. She finds the pit and sees the tramp lying crumpled on the ground, clearly dead. She stares at him for a moment, then turns and walks away.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Rygaard and Oakes are forced to share the same landing; Shelby gets in hot water with the law over a contested log; Joe and Coatsy struggle to get the Papac crew back on track; the Dreadknots have a run-in with Fish and Wildlife.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: After coming across a rare historical artifact, Shelby forms an unlikely alliance with Professor Sam Hyde of Southeastern Louisiana University and the two scour the deepest parts of the Swamp on the search for lost treasures.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe Rygaard pushes his crew to a breaking point; Gary and Eddie blow up their business to cash in on green gold; David Zitterkopf could see his family empire fall to pieces, with one wrong move; a mutiny is underway among the Chapman crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Industry titans Pihl Logging and Rygaard Logging tackle some of their most challenging jobs yet; Frank Harkness makes a name for himself; Buckin' Billy Ray takes to the treetops of Vancouver Island, risking his life to keep other people safe.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Some loggers have more reasons to be grateful than do others as Thanksgiving arrives; the Pihl crew loses men to illness; the Gustafson crew's younger members blow off steam; the season's first snowfall bodes a warning for the Stump Branch crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Gustafson crew faces a nearly impossible deadline; half the Pihl crew skips work; Stump Branch mistakes and inexperience put profits and lives at risk; Jay Browning makes a troubling discovery about his next job.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Swamp Man's equipment is sabotaged; Joe's shortcuts lead to trouble with the boss; Jason oversteps his boundaries and things get heated.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: A misstep by Joe cripples the yarder for Papac; Gabe pulls out a massive feller buncher; the Dreadknots and Chapman try to make it through a dangerous lightning storm.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe Rygaard takes on the toughest challenge of his career; Papac Alaska goes to a remote, mountainous island to tackle the biggest job in the company's history; Greg Chapman starts on a quest to find a lost logging train.

programme.desc: As Papac Alaska goes deeper into their seven thousand acre site, Joe and Coatsy devise a plan of attack for the next section of this massive project; Rygaard Logging is fighting to get the wood out; Gary and Eddie need to step up their game.

programme.desc: Cheap Trick guitarist Rick Nielsen opens the doors to his private rock'n'roll warehouse; Mike and Frank scour a log cabin village museum and go nuts for some cast iron erotica; John's Wisconsin property is packed with great stuff.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Frank and Danielle pick a former trading post; vintage medical curios at Dr. Smith's family hospital; Cotton's roadside home.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike tries to keep a poker face while bidding on a 1944 Knucklehead Harley; a random freestyle stop leads to a mega pick honey hole; Danielle gets fired up over a gun appraisal.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike does business with a fast-talking taxidermy deer; an old-school general store that's packed with merchandise; Mike spies a retro billboard that could be worth a bundle.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In the small town of Ponder, a dark secret looms; the townspeople pounce on lockers like hordes of zombies. Ricky and Bubba score some intimate objects for cattle. Jenny Grumbles scrambles for antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: The buyers ride out to the cowboy town of Mesquite, Texas. Mary Padian tries to impress Dr. Moe with a sleak, refurbished pool table. Jenny Grumbles uncovers a hot and steely garden item.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Walt Cade and his buyers hit the road to Austin, Texas--the capital of the state and home to a multitude of proudly eclectic weirdoes. Moe and Mary battle for an antique unit with an 8 grand payout.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Some buyers have enjoyed a successful first day in Austin, but on the second and final day, the Doc and the Junkster turn desperate. Not wanting to return home with an empty rental truck.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: On the hottest day of summer, the buyers return to the wealthy suburb of Lake Highlands, Texas. Victor Rjesnjansky gets burned by a mistake, but a surprise find leads him to the floor of the Dallas Mavericks basketball arena.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Looking for a competitive edge in the male-dominated storage auction scene, the Dazzler uses her feminine wiles to obtain inside information. Ricky and Bubba set their Texas land speed record. Mary gets a second opinion on a find that Moe considers worthless. Venturing where no women are allowed, Jenny uncovers clues to the secrets of a centuries-old secret society. Victor and the other men mock her methods, but Jenny demonstrates that force is often no match for flirtation and that a smile can open all kinds of doors.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Sparks fly in DeSoto, Texas, as Lesa Lewis and Jerry Simpson return from East Texas to make another score -- and this time, Jenny Grumbles and Mary Padian are ready.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: In this episode the buyers head back to familiar territory--Brooklyn. Big Steve is desperate to fill his flea market shelves, having not made any purchases in weeks.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: The buyers are hoping for luck in Westchester County. Joe P has scored some great antiques here in the past and is looking for more of the same.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: In Amityville, Mike B thinks "BIG" bringing his cube truck, knowing his shelves need restocking. Candy and Courtney do a little camera work of their own while looking for vintage. Joe P works on his golf swing and has some antiques checked out.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: The buyers are ready to bid at a high-end facility in Bushwick. It's the end of the month and Mike B needs to stock up on merchandise.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: Hoping that Queens Village will treat them right, Chris and Tad are looking for industrial. Joe P knows Queens like the back of his hand having been there 52 years, so he has an idea what's in store for him.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: In this episode, the gang hits an auction in Wallabout. Candy and Courtney look for clothing and are off to the races. Mike B knows he needs to move bulk on the hustlers scale.

programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival -- Phillip McMillan. programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie.

programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, when Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves, Willie signs Kay and Bobo up for a doggie obedience class.

programme.desc: When Jep and Jessica move into Willie and Jase's neighborhood, Jep is sidelined with an illness, causing Willie and the Robertson family to pitch in and help Jessica get her new house ready in time for Jep's arrival home.

programme.desc: Looking to expand their company, Darrell Ward and Lisa Kelly head into Alberta and onto a trail nicknamed "The Death Road."

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: It's just over a month into the new ice road season and more than 800 truckers are on the ice, working around the clock.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Darrell Ward faces a trail nicknamed the obstacle course. Todd Dewey struggles to clear a melting ice bridge.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: On her first ever solo trip, Polar rookie Steph Custance braves one of the longest ice crossings on the winter roads map. An engine fire stops Lisa Kelly dead in her tracks.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Alex Debogorski confronts a creek that's thawed in the middle of the road. On an important run for Polar, Art Burke receives news that could be devastating.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: As the end of the record short season nears, Polar Boss Mark Kohaykewych makes an historic deal with rivals Darrell Ward and Lisa Kelly.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The historic four truck convoy faces fire and a crossing so thin, they must test the thickness themselves.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district--moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Only in Dog's world would a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well a group of hostile squatters on government land! They're all part of the hunt for an elusive criminal.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This hunt is personal. Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law. She's didn't come to court to answer charges that

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is dispatched to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call--The Dog! And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs. A passerby in Chinatown tells Dog that Raymond's asleep on a park bench.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale. But this only masks deeper problems with the couple.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog usually takes his job personally, but this time a case really hits home. First, he and Beth receive a special gift--a painting of Dog's recently deceased daughter, Barbara Katy.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children and making them honorary members of his posse.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Other than bringing criminals to justice, one of Dog's loves is teaching the next generation of bounty hunters the tricks of the trade. Today he has a new student.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in Colorado helping a fellow bondsmen clean up his files. The target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A small town bondsmen is in over his head, his business on the line, when he makes a desperate plea for help. Dog agrees and launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. His kind heart and inexperience have led him to bail out a bevy of bail jumpers.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain. This morning, he takes the toddler for a spin around the yard in her little red wagon.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem on his hands. One of his clients, Owen, has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture. Dog gets special help from a UPS driver,

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Colorado bondsman Bobby Brown's got trouble and his name is Jackson. Weighing in at over 240lbs and standing six foot tall this bad boy has skipped out on a $10,000 bond.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have their hands full when they go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag" -- in this case a $20,000 bond. Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What better way for Dog to start his morning, than at an elementary school Career Day, inspiring a new generation of potential bounty hunters? After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: They say you can't teach an old dog new tricks, but what if it's The Dog doing the teaching? Today's target is wanted on domestic abuse charges, but when Dog discovers she works for an escort service he opts for a new twist on an old ruse.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's got a twofer on his hands, but the cases couldn't be more different. The first is a woman whose family wants her back in jail, the other is a former choirboy whose family ties are strong.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog thinks he's got an average day of bounty hunting ahead of him, but he couldn't be more wrong. Beth calls a client, Daphne, whose bond they have to revoke and makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy. He enlists the family in an elaborate hoax to lure the runner home.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The bounty-hunter adventures of Duane "Dog" Chapman and his Posse are chronicled in this one hour "Best Of" special, featuring superlative memorable moments from the previous seven seasons.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Tonight, for the first time ever on Kitchen Nightmares, Gordon takes on a nightmare restaurant abroad. La Parra de Burriana is an ex-pat restaurant in Nerja on Spain's Costa del Sol. Nestling among the cafes lining the seafront offering all-day English breakfast and chips, La Parra is the brainchild of twenty-six-year-old ex-nightclub manager Laurence. He set himself up in business eighteen months ago with a loan from his dad and, although he's not an experienced chef, mans the kitchen on his own, determined to offer something better than chips to his largely British clientele.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's second programme Gordon tackles a pub for the first time, getting to grips with The Fenwick Arms in rural Lancashire. The pub is run by landlord Brian who, after thirty years in the business and a quadruple heart-bypass, still puts in 120 hours a week and insists on laying down the law in the kitchen. Despite their best endeavours Brian and his partner Elaine are ~£250k in debt, losing ~1500 a week and facing bankruptcy within three months unless there's a drastic reversal in their fortunes.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's programme Gordon finds a chef caught in a time warp when he tackles a picturesque but largely unfrequented upmarket restaurant in King's Lynn, a traditional market town on the Norfolk coast. For the last eighteen months ex Michelin-starred chef Nick has owned and run Rococo but his past success is now eluding him. The menu is past its sell-by date, the service is stuffy, the food is over-priced and the only thing being fed is his ego. Yet, despite debts of ~£100k and the prospect of putting his home at risk and his young family on the streets, Nick continues to cook comatose in a 1990s fantasy land of his own making.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's final programme of the series Gordon grapples with girl power when he takes on an intimate family-run restaurant in the heart of WAG territory near Liverpool. For the last three years Morgan's has been run by antiques dealer-turned-restaurateur SANDY and her two daughters HELEN and LAURA. The beautifully-designed dining room has a prime high street location and should be the perfect eatery for the trendy local clientele. But Head Chef Phil is grappling with an eclectic menu that includes mashed potato with apricots and his cooking's just not up to it.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to the Historic Calumet Inn, in Pipestone, Minnesota. Joint owners, Vanda and Rina Smrkovski were given the inn as a gift by their father (who they still call “daddy”), and they treat it with less respect than a dolls house.

programme.title: Hotel Hell

programme.title: Hotel Hell

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: This week Gordon is at a god-awful Italian restaurant in Derby. La Gondola is stuck in a time-warp with naff Seventies cuisine, bad net curtains and no customers. New owner Daniela bought the place because she got married there back in the day but her sentimentality has blinded her to the fact that she's bagged a white elephant. Gordon's biggest problem is head chef Steve, one of the worst he's ever met, and one who'd rather open a tin of tuna or a packet of soup than create a proper meal. Can Gordon get the kitchen cooking again and save La Gondala from sinking?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The venue for tonight's first programme is Ruby Tates in Brighton, owned and run by ex-actor and failed Hollywood wannabe ALLAN LOVE. Situated in an affluent and trendy area just one street back from the beach, it's an oyster bar and seafood restaurant but Allan's never tasted the food because he hates fish.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The venue for tonight's programme is The Priory, a 100-seater carvery in Haywards Heath, Sussex owned by ex IT consultant Scott. The former chapel of a nineteenth-century convent, the restaurant is in a spectacularly beautiful location and offers bargain roast dinners from a carvery that's been running for twenty years. Scott bought the place for £300k but with an ageing clientele eating for half-price, he's losing £5,000 a week.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: From the ancient Babylonians to modern-day urban explorers, mankind has always been fascinated by abandoned places; discovering the allure that draws people to post-apocalyptic landscapes.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: All over the world are forbidden "triangles" that are mysterious regions where ships, planes and people enter and then just disappear; they are found in Bermuda, Alaska, Japan and elsewhere.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: More than 80% of the Earth's oceans remain unexplored, and in many ways, the underwater world is the final frontier; as new technology allows people to explore oceans and deep lakes more than ever before, nobody knows what they will find.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: King Arthur, England's first pop culture superhero; his exploits inspired blockbuster movies and television series like "Middle Earth", "Harry Potter", "Game of Thrones" and "Star Wars"; the significant impact of Arthurian legend on Western culture.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: People on every continent have claimed to see Bigfoot's footprints. And ancient myths and legends speak of an ape-like giant stalking the earth. What if, as Ancient Astronaut theorists believe, there is evidence to connect Bigfoot with an alien species?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Thirteen crystal skulls which are believed to hold a mystical power whose secrets will be revealed when the skulls come together to form a global grid.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Mysterious relics and sealed vaults may have been hidden on purpose and protected by an extraterrestrial source.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The U.S. military denies that the 1947 Roswell crash involved anything other than a weather balloon, but theorists claim that other UFO crashes were reported all over the world at the same time as the crash and that the wreckages were retrieved.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Erich von Däniken's "Chariots of the Gods?" suggests that aliens visited Earth in the distant past, and there are those who believe that he will be proven right.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Researchers ask if Cloud computing represents the rediscovery of an ancient repository of knowledge known as the Akashic Record; neuroscientist Dr. Dario Nardi measures the brainwaves of Dr. Deepak Chopra as he enters a state of deep meditation.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: During World War Two, the Nazis stole vast amounts of art, gold, silver and currency, and stashed it across Europe; while some of the plunder has been recovered, much more is still missing nearly 80 years later.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: After a series of dark and ominous events, an unassuming family home on Long Island becomes the most notorious house in America; 50 years later, it's spawned a title wave of books, documentaries, and films.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: A series of unexplained deaths near Chicago in 1982 starts a nationwide panic; the victims are connected by one frightening detail: cyanide-tainted capsules of Extra-Strength Tylenol; 40 years later, it remains an active FBI investigation.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: In 1969, a serial killer taunts investigators with cryptic ciphers, leaving police and the public questioning his identity for over 50 years; new evidence and technology may finally be able to crack his code and discover who the Zodiac Killer is.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: In 1587, a group of settlers land off the coast of North Carolina on Roanoke Island to establish the first English Colony in America; a few years later, the 115 men, women and children vanish without a trace, leaving only cryptic clues.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: Despite centuries of sightings and searches, one deep-sea monster remains unidentified; as evidence continues to mount, the mystery endures as to whether the Loch Ness monster exists.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries

programme.title: Crime 360

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: When a hairstylist failed to pick up her children for a planned celebration, she was reported missing by her ex-husband; investigators discovered a bloody scene at the salon, but the hairstylist and her SUV were gone.
